headline: Evergy Reports Strong Q3 Earnings and Investment Plans
summary: Evergy ( (EVRG) ) has provided an update. Evergy, Inc. has reported impressive third-quarter 2024 results, with GAAP earnings per share rising to $2.02 from $1.53 in 2023, driven by new retail rates and increased demand. The company also announced a 4% increase in its dividend and reaffirmed its 2024 earnings guidance, while setting a 2025 EPS target of $3.92 to $4.12. Evergy unveiled a significant $16.2 billion capital investment plan to enhance infrastructure, supporting growth in Kansas and M
